text: A Kiss as Long as Eternity (Поцелуй длиною в вечность) is a Russian album by Vitas (Витас), released in 2004. The album sold over 2 million copies within the first 6 months of its release.English language article from Chinese websitePlanet Vitas Vitas wrote the songs Mantra, I Believe In Love and Internet Mood himself, and A Kiss as Long as Eternity, Half Night, Half Day, Heartbeat, In Shorts and a T-shirt and Streets Of The Capital in collaboration with other songwriters. Unusually for Vitas' own compositions, he makes little use of high-pitched vocals on this album: one reviewer remarked "It was... delightful to find his baritone and bass richer and smoother than before." ==Track listing== {| class="wikitable" |- !
